coach.title: AI Financial Coach
coach.subtitle: Chat with your AI agents for personalized financial advice
coach.welcomeMessage:
Hello! I'm your AI Financial Coach. I have four specialized agents ready to help you:

1. Income Pattern Agent - Understands your income cycles
2. Spending Watchdog - Monitors your expenses
3. Goal Planner - Helps set and achieve savings goals
4. Emergency Fund Agent - Predicts dry periods

How can I help you today?
coach.quickQuestion1: When will my next income spike be?
coach.quickQuestion3: How can I save â‚¹1000 this month?
coach.quickQuestion4: Do I have enough emergency fund?
coach.quickQuestion6: Suggest a savings goal for me
